channel.title: Linux on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Blog

item.title: Moving to Antergos from Ubuntu
item.description: Nine months ago, I decided that I had enough with Windows and planned to completely move to GNU/Linux (Yeah, it’s not Linux, it’s GNU/Linux). Since I own only one laptop, I do not prefer distro jumping and needed to settle down with something. After googling for a while, I picked Ubuntu. Ubuntu, with some fixes and theming, is a really awesome distro to dive into. Except for the WiFi issue, which is partially fixable, everything seemed nice about it.
